name: Stop sign
description: To bring traffic to a stop

name: Stop sign
description: To bring traffic to a stop

name: Stop/Yield sign
description: To allow traffic turning left, to do so (if it can be done without interfering with cross traffic) without stopping

name: 3-way stop
description: To bring traffic from all three directions to a stop

name: 4-way stop
description: To bring traffic from all four directions to a stop

name: Yield sign
description: To indicate that you must yield to other traffic

name: Yield to pedestrians
description: To compel you to give priority to pedestrians crossing the road or wanting to cross the road

name: Yield at traffic circle
description: To warn you that there is a traffic circle ahead where they must expect to yield

name: No entry
description: To indicate that no traffic may proceed past the sign on the road, carriageway or lane

name: One-way roadway
description: To indicate that there is a one-way carriageway to the left, right, or ahead

name: One-way roadway
description: To indicate that there is a one-way carriageway to the left, right, or ahead

name: One-way roadway
description: To indicate that there is a one-way carriageway to the left, right, or ahead

name: Pedestrian priority
description: To give priority to pedestrians but limit other traffic to emergency vehicles, vehicles loading and off loading goods and maintenance vehicles

name: Yield to oncoming traffic
description: To indicate that there is a single carriageway ahead for use by by vehicle from both directions

name: Minimum speed sign
description: To regulate the minimum speed of traffic

name: Vehicles exceeding mass only
description: To compel drivers of certain heavy vehicles to use the road or part of the road indicated by this road traffic sign

name: Keep left
description: To indicate that you must drive to the left or right of an obstruction where the sign is displayed

name: Keep right
description: To indicate that you must drive to the left or right of an obstruction where the sign is displayed

name: Proceed left only
description: To indicate the direction in which you must proceed

name: Proceed right only
description: To indicate the direction in which you must proceed

name: Proceed straight only
description: To indicate the direction in which you must proceed

name: Turn left only
description: To indicate to drivers the direction in which they must turn at the intersection ahead

name: Turn right only
description: To indicate to drivers the direction in which they must turn at the intersection ahead

name: Pedestrians only
description: To indicate that the road or part of the road may be used by pedestrians only

name: Cyclists only
description: To indicate that the road or part of the road may be used by cyclists only

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate to cyclists and pedestrians which part of a road they must use

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate that part of the road is divided and that part may be used by cyclists and pedestrians only

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate to cyclists and pedestrians which part of a road they must use

name: Cyclists and pedestrians only
description: To indicate that part of the road is divided and that part may be used by cyclists and pedestrians only

name: Motorcycles only
description: Indicate that a road or part of a road may be used by motorcyclists only

name: Motor cars only
description: Indicate that a road or part of a road may be used by motorcars only

name: Taxis only
description: To indicate that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by taxis

name: Minibuses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by minibuses

name: Midi buses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by midibuses

name: Buses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by buses

name: Delivery vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by delivery vehicles only

name: Goods vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by goods vehicles

name: Goods vehicles exceeding an indicated GVM
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by goods vehicles with a gross vehicle mass (GVM) or a gross combination mass (GCM) exceeding the mass indicated in tonnes by means of a number on such sign

name: Construction vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by construction vehicles

name: Vehicles transporting dangerous substances only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by vehicles conveying dangerous goods

name: Abnormal vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by abnormal vehicles

name: Rickshaws only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by rickshaws

name: Tour buses only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by tour buses

name: Agricultural vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by agricultural vehicles

name: Animal-drawn vehicles only
description: Indicates that the road or a portion of the road is set aside for use by animal-drawn vehicles

name: Pay toll
description: To give you a last opportunity to follow an alternative route, or to proceed on the route and pay toll fees

name: Switch headlamps on
description: To indicate that you must switch on your headlights in order to see and be seen

name: Buses and minibuses only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by buses and minibuses

name: Buses and midi buses only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by buses and midibuses

name: Buses, midi buses and minibuses only
description: Indicates that the road or portion of the road is set aside for use by buses, midibuses and minibuses

name: Roundabout
description: To indicate that you must move in a clockwise direction at the junction

name: Speed limit
description: Inform you of the speed limit applicable on this road. The restriction applies from the sign

name: Mass limit
description: To prevent certain heavy vehicles from using a road or part of a road

name: Axle mass limit
description: To prohibit certain heavy vehicles from using the road

name: Height limit
description: To warn you against a height restriction ahead

name: Length limit
description: To prohibit long vehicles from using a road where such a vehicle will not be able to negotiate a curve or will turn in such a manner that it will disrupt or endanger other traffic

name: Excessive noise prohibited
description: To prohibit noise

name: Hitch-hiking prohibited
description: To prohibit pedestrians and stationary vehicles

name: Unauthorised vehicles prohibited
description: To prohibit drivers without special authorisation from entering a certain road or section of a road

name: Left turn ahead prohibited
description: To prohibit vehicles from turning at an intersection

name: Right turn ahead prohibited
description: To prohibit vehicles from turning at an intersection

name: Left turn prohibited
description: To prohibit traffic from turning left

name: Right turn
description: To prohibit traffic from turning right

name: U-turn prohibited
description: To vehicles from turning around so that it faces the opposite direction

name: Overtaking prohibited
description: To inform drivers that overtaking vehicles is prohibited for the next 500m

name: Overtaking prohibited
description: To inform drivers that overtaking vehicles is prohibited for the next 500m

name: Parking prohibited
description: To prohibit drivers from parking during any time of the day or night

name: Stopping prohibited
description: To ensure traffic flow and prevent that driver’s views are not impaired by stationary vehicles

name: Pedestrians prohibited
description: To prohibit pedestrians from proceeding past this sign where they could cause a danger to themselves and to vehicles

name: Pedal cycles prohibited
description: To prohibit cyclists from using the carriageway, lane or path where they can cause a danger to themselves and to other road users

name: Pedal cycles and pedestrians prohibited
description: To prevent cyclists and pedestrians from using a certain road or a certain section of a road where they can cause a danger to themselves or other road users

name: Motorcycles prohibited
description: To prohibit motorcycles, on part of a carriageway, for safety reasons

name: Motorcars prohibited
description: To prohibit motorcars from entering the area, for safety or any other reasons

name: Taxis prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a taxi that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Minibuses prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a minibus that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Midi buses prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a midibus that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Buses prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a bus that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Delivery vehicles prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a delivery vehicle that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Goods vehicles prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a goods vehicle that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Goods vehicles exceeding an indicated GVM
description: Indicates to the driver of a goods vehicle with a gross vehicle mass (GVM) or a gross combination mass (GCM) in excess of that mass indicated in tonnes, by means of a number on such sign, that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Construction vehicles prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a construction vehicle that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Vehicles transporting dangerous substances prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a vehicle conveying dangerous goods that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Abnormal vehicles prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of an abnormal vehicle that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Rickshaws prohibited
description: Indicates to a person pulling a rickshaw that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Tour buses prohibited
description: Indicates to a driver of a tour bus that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Agricultural vehicles prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of an agricultural vehicle that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Animal-drawn vehicles prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of an animal-drawn vehicle that he or she shall not proceed beyond such sign

name: Horses and riders prohibited
description: Indicates to a horse rider that horses and riders, whether mounted on or leading a horse, are prohibited beyond such sign

name: Width limit
description: Indicates to the driver of a vehicle that he or she shall not proceed beyond the sign unless the overall width of the vehicle, is less than the width indicated in metres, by means of a number on such sign

name: Towed vehicles prohibited
description: Indicates to the driver of a vehicle that no vehicle which is towing another vehicle shall proceed beyond such sign

name: Hawkers prohibited
description: To prohibit hawkers in this area during any time of the day or night

name: Bus reservation
description: To indicate that the road or part of the carriageway is reserved for buses only

name: Bus parking reservation
description: To indicate that the road or part of the carriageway is reserved for buses to park only

name: Bus lane reservation
description: To indicate that no other class of vehicle may use that part of the road

name: Begin bus lane reservation
description: To indicate where the reserved traffic lane which only buses may enter, starts

name: Pedal cycle lane reservation
description: To inform you that that the lane is for bicycles only

name: Pedal cycle parking reservation
description: To inform you that a parking area is reserved for bicycles only

name: Parking
description: To indicates a parking area for vehicles with a GVM of less than 3 500 kg where no time limit applies but a fee must be paid

name: Limited parking
description: To indicates a parking area that may be used free of charge or at a fee and the maximum time allowed for a vehicle to be parked, is displayed

name: Motorcycle reservation
description: To reserve a portion of a road for use by motorcycles only

name: Motor cycle parking reservation
description: To reserve a portion of a parking area for use by motorcycles only

name: Motor car reservation
description: The areas concerned are reserved for motor cars to use

name: Motor car parking
description: The areas concerned are reserved for motor cars to park

description: The areas concerned are reserved for taxi's to use

description: The areas concerned are reserved for taxi's to park

name: Bus Stop Reservation
description: To allow minibuses to take up and drop passengers off. Such a vehicle must display an appropriate emblem, logo or any other indication that they are minibuses

name: Minibus stop reservation
description: To allow minibuses to take up and drop passengers off. Such a vehicle must display an appropriate emblem, logo or any other indication that they are minibuses

name: Bus and minibus reservation
description: The areas concerned are reserved for Bus and minibus's to use

description: The areas concerned are reserved for Bus and minibus's to park

description: The lanes concerned are reserved for Bus and minibus's to use

description: The lanes concerned are reserved for Bus and minibus's to use and are about to begin

name: Bus and midi bus reservation
description: The areas concerned are reserved for Bus and midibus's to use

description: The lanes concerned are reserved for Bus and midibus's to use

description: The areas concerned are reserved for Bus, midibus and minibus's to use

description: The lanes concerned are reserved for Bus, midibus and minibus's to use

name: Dual-carriageway freeway begins
description: To indicate that a freeway begins at the sign and that the rules that apply to freeways are effective from here

name: Single-carriageway freeway begins
description: To indicate that a single-carriageway freeway begins at the sign and that all rules that apply to freeways are effective from here

name: Woonerf
description: To prohibit the entry of all vehicles with a mass exceeding 3 500 kg, or vehicles, which have more than 10 seats, except for local access or delivery

name: Single-time limit sign
description: To indicate that the regulatory sign applies only for the period(s) or during conditions indicated on this sign.

name: Two-time limit sign
description: To indicate that the regulatory sign applies only for the period(s) or during conditions indicated on this sign.

name: Two-time periods/days limit sign
description: To indicate that the regulatory sign applies only for the period(s) or during conditions indicated on this sign.

name: Three-time periods/days limit sign
description: To indicate that the regulatory sign applies only for the period(s) or during conditions indicated on this sign.

name: Maximum stay during two periods/days
description: To limit the times and periods of stopping.

name: Maximum stay during two periods/days
description: To limit the times and periods of stopping.

name: Day time sign
description: To inform you that the regulatory sign applies during daytime

name: Night time sign
description: To inform you that the regulatory sign applies during night time

name: Reserved movement left by vehicles
description: To indicate that the restriction indicated on the regulatory sign applies in the direction of the arrow

name: Reserved movement right by vehicles
description: To indicate that the restriction indicated on the regulatory sign applies in the direction of the arrow

name: Reserved movement right and left by vehicles
description: To indicate that the restriction indicated on the regulatory sign applies in the direction of the arrow

name: Pay and display sign
description: To indicate that parking fees must be paid in the parking area

name: Operator identifying sign
description: To indicate that the sign applies to drivers of vehicles operated by the company, owner or organisation indicated by the logo or words.

name: Operator identifying sign
description: To indicate that the sign applies to drivers of vehicles operated by the company, owner or organisation indicated by the logo or words.

name: Weight restriction sign
description: Restricts the maximum weight of vehicles for this area/road

name: Engine power restriction sign
description: Restricst the maximum engine size that is allowed for this area/road

name: Local access only
description: Indicates that this road is not a through road and only leads into the area and out

name: For distance sign
description: Indicates that the above instructions is only applicable for a certain distance

name: Maximum number of vehicles sign
description: To indicate to the driver that the reservation indicated on the regulatory sign is further restricted by a maximum number of vehicles
